Objective: Does BRV Have Faster Onset Time & Greater Effect Than LEV in Epilepsy Pts Using PPR Pharmacodynamic Efficacy Endpoint
OfficialTitle: Does BRV Have a Faster Onset Time and Greater Effect Than LEV in Epilepsy Patients?: A Prospective, Randomized, Crossover, Double-blind, Controlled Intravenous Study Using the PPR as a Pharmacodynamic Efficacy Endpoint
Title: Does BRV Have Faster Onset Time & Greater Effect Than LEV in Epilepsy Pts Using PPR Pharmacodynamic Efficacy Endpoint
